title: Using a custom ArDrive-Core-JS (Optional) (/sdks/(clis)/ardrive-cli/(build-and-run-from-source)/using-a-custom-ardrive-core-js-optional)
content: To test a with a custom version of the `ardrive-core-js` library on your local system, change the `"ardrive-core-js"` line in `package.json` to the root of your local `ardrive-core-js` repo:
